query:
UPDATE users u1
            SET
                password = COALESCE($2, u2.password),
                billing = COALESCE($3, u2.billing),
                active = COALESCE($4, u2.active),
                updated_at = NOW()
            FROM users u2 
            WHERE u1.id = $1
                AND u1.id = u2.id
                AND u1.role = 'user';
